text: Frederick F. Woerner Jr. (August 12, 1933 â€“ March 29, 2023) was a four-star general of the United States Army. He was Commander-in-Chief of United States Southern Command, former Chairman of the American Battle Monuments Commission, and Professor Emeritus of Boston University. He died on March 29, 2023. ==References== Category:American generals Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:People from Philadelphia Category:1933 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Military people from Pennsylvania
title: Frederick F. Woerner Jr.
